page.title: 13Burscough-Spare Time.
page.content: by Kerry I spend my spare time watching T.V reading books,rifle shooting,playing badminton,going out to discos,going to the cinema and shopping.The programmes I like watching are Dempsy and Makepeace,Eastenders,Fresh Fields,Open All Hours,That's My Boy,Horror movies eg Hallowin and Salems Lot and cartoons I like to read romantic books by Sweat Dreams,Silhouette and Candlelight Romance.I also like to read exciting and adventurous stories.I go rifle shooting once a month to either Altcar rifle range or Appelton rifle range.My rifle is an Anschutz and was made in Germany and it takes 5mm bullets.I play badminton at Burscough sports centre on a Saturday with my cousin and on a Tuesday with the school.I like going to the cinema at Southport.
